pages.text: One who it is right to say nothing but truth concerning God. Now I have come to you from your Guardian Evolver with guidance. So let the Children of Israel exit along with me.”
Pharaoh said, “If indeed you have come with a sign, show it if you tell the truth.”
Then Moses threw his staff, and behold, it was a serpent, plain for all to see
And he pulled out his hand, and behold, it looked white to all beholders
Said the nomarchs of the people of Pharaoh, “This is indeed an illusionist well-versed
“His plan is to get you out of your land. So what is it you advise?”
They said, “Keep him and his brother in suspense, and send to the cities, people to collect
And bring up to you all illusionists well-versed.”
So the illusionists came to Pharaoh. They said, “Of course we will have a reward if we win?”
He said, “Yes, for you will, in that case, be nearest to me.”
They said, “O Moses, will you throw first, or shall we throw?”
Said Moses, “You throw.” When they threw, they tricked the eyes of people, and struck fear into them, for they showed great illusions
We put into Moses’ mind by inspiration, “Throw your staff.” And behold, it instantly made all the illusions that they faked disappear
So truth was confirmed, and all that they did was made of no effect
So they were thoroughly defeated there and then, crushed
But the illusionists fell down prostrate in adoration
